title: Object relative Depth
description: Contains a list of object IDs with their relative depth within the picture. The object ID will match the object detection ID (ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.objectDetection) and depth is calculated by taking the median of the depth image (ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.depth-map-gen) within the bounding box

ID.description: A number identifying this object in the set.

depth.description: Relative depth of an object within the image from 0 to 1. 0 being the very front of the image and 1 being the furthest point. Float32 output

objects.description: The set of object IDs with corresponding depth values between 0 and 1 within in the graphic.
